meanings.sent1: His grandfather predeceasing him meant he never got to meet him.
meanings.sent2: She worried about predeceasing her beloved pet.
meanings.sent3: The cat joked about predeceasing its owner to get more treats.
meanings.sent4: The setting sun seemed to be predeceasing the moon's rise.
meanings.sent5: The idea of predeceasing a loved one was too painful to bear.

meanings.sent1: The ancient tree predeceasing the new saplings was a natural cycle.
meanings.sent2: The family discussed who would be predeceasing whom in their wills.
meanings.sent3: The flowers in the garden whispered about predeceasing each other in a race.
meanings.sent4: The old clock seemed to be predeceasing the modern gadgets in the house.
meanings.sent5: The legend of the phoenix predeceasing itself captivated the children's imagination.
